entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Pickle Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:11 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pickle Lake Airport 3:55 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
